function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Managers not providing complete understanding of agility capabilities","Impact":"Incomplete understanding of agility may lead to ineffective response to Covid-19 restrictions and challenges","Mitigation":"Provide training and resources to enhance managers' understanding of agility capabilities","Technologies":"Online training platforms, virtual workshops","People":"Managers of service SMEs","Owner":"Training and development department"},{"Description":"Lack of strategic sensitivity in service SMEs","Impact":"Inability to anticipate future needs and market changes, leading to vulnerability during crises like the Covid-19 pandemic","Mitigation":"Conduct workshops and seminars on strategic sensitivity, encourage market research and trend analysis","Technologies":"Market research tools, trend analysis software","People":"Managers and employees of service SMEs","Owner":"Business development department"},{"Description":"Lack of focus on digitalization-related changes","Impact":"Inability to adapt to digitalization trends, leading to loss of competitive advantage and decreased market relevance","Mitigation":"Invest in digitalization training and tools, encourage adoption of digital solutions","Technologies":"Digital training platforms, digitalization tools and software","People":"Managers and employees of service SMEs","Owner":"Digitalization department"}]}
